Name: Buy Hyacinths
About the game: Sheepy goes to university! Congratulations Sheepy! But it's hard to be a sheep in a human world. Not everybody wants to see you graduate! Lollop around the campus! Nuzzle whatever you find, and sniff out secrets. Head to lectures and try out assignments, adventures and crimes! Make lifelong friendships, and stand up against discrimination! By day you can study law, dance, writing, science and drama. By night, enjoy Friend Time - a range of activities with your new neighbours. Experience the real highs and lows of dorm life. Solve the goose mystery, and weep for those long lost. Live and learn, but beware the tanglewood snare! Shine bright on pancake day, and hold tight in the darkness. A colourful narrative adventure game about being a real-live sheep at university. Over fifteen days and fifteen nights, Sheepy experiences the three years of study, of friendship and heartbreak.
